name: Speed Farming
description:
Enter a rich world exploring income inequality as you labor away as the sole provider of produce for a small isolated town. On your farm lies dangerous magics - when your plants overgrow, they become alive! Hack and slash through vicious plant monsters and keep the city safe from their tainted flux!

DISCLAIMER: This was a grid-based game prototype made for class as an excuse to practice making/coding pixel tilesets. Due to the limited time frame, it does not fulfill its goal to make a socially impactful game about income inequality, and instead is just a dinky game where you play as some guy with a rock.

A research paper can be found below about how I would potentially develop this game in the future while responsibly covering issues surrounding the lived-in experiences of income inequality!

Credits:

  • Michelle Nie (Art/Programming)
